queries.name: Robert Redford co-stars
Property Paths
DBpedia RDF Schema Information
DBpedia: Hierachy of Properties
DBpedia: Hierachy of Classes
DBpedia: Signature of Properties
Class->Property->Class Path
Class Paths
Wasabi: Collaborations of a particular artist (exclude group members)

queries.query:
prefix wsb:     <http://ns.inria.fr/wasabi/ontology/>
prefix schema: <http://schema.org/>

select distinct ?s ?p ?o (?p as ?type) where {
        ?x1 schema:genre ?p ; foaf:name ?s ; a ?x1type.
        ?x2 schema:genre ?p ; foaf:name ?o ; a ?x2type.

        filter (?x1 != ?x2)
        filter (?x1type = wsb:Artist_Person || ?x1type = wsb:Artist_Group)
        filter (?x2type = wsb:Artist_Person || ?x2type = wsb:Artist_Group)
} limit 1000
queries.name: Artist network based on common genre (Wasabi)
Collaboration network of a particular artist (per type)
